string.name: msg
string.value: The Crescent Moon Ring and Halfmoon Ring\r\ncannot be equipped simultaneously.

string.name: msg
string.value: The Rising Sun Pendant and Blazing Sun Pendant\r\ncannot be equipped simultaneously.

string.name: msg
string.value: The Rising Sun Ring and Blazing Sun Ring\r\ncannot be equipped simultaneously.

string.name: msg
string.value: You can only have one Angelic \r\nBlessing Ring equipped.

string.name: msg
string.value: You can only have one of the following equipped \r\nat a time: Bronze Cross Ring, Silver Cross Ring, Gold Cross \r\nRing, or Platinum Cross Ring.

string.name: msg
string.value:
You can only have one of the following equipped 
at a time: Explorer's Ring, Lilin's Ring,
Resistance Ring, Gratias Ring,
Swordsman Ring, Magician Ring, Bowman Ring,
or Dual Blade Ring.
